title: Dropsy (2.3.0.5) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_dropsy_2.3.0.5.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Change log:
Patch 1.2
â€‹â€¢ Beds now allow selection of wake-up time
â€‹â€¢ Dream sequences occur only while sleeping at home
â€‹â€¢ Day cycle slightly elongated, and night cycle slightly shortened
â€‹â€¢ Can now hug church volunteer after completing church puzzle thread
â€‹â€¢ Fix black screen bug caused by the shed cutscene
â€‹â€¢ Rework screen fading to fix various related bugs
â€‹â€¢ Adjust how world map displays scene dots
â€‹â€¢ Opening the world map now properly stops the player walker
â€‹â€¢ Add options menu button to return to title screen
â€‹â€¢ Allow hugging southern snack guard and add polish to both snack guards
â€‹â€¢ Fix camera monitors to properly show the current state of the tram cars and dog
â€‹â€¢ Give hydrant robot dialogue related to dog getting lost
â€‹â€¢ Add closeups to the tables outside the mine and the airport
â€‹â€¢ Dog will correctly warn Dropsy when trying to leave while searching for bird's mother
â€‹â€¢ Dog will walk to Dropsy to ask for his sock to be put on the grave if he was offscreen
â€‹â€¢ Give the chickenman a 'free hugs' sign
â€‹â€¢ Correctly enable toll booth drawing on the hug wall
â€‹â€¢ Make Thor amulet easier to collect outside the mine entrance
â€‹â€¢ Can show the bracelet to the preacher while in the playground
â€‹â€¢ Dropsy can attempt to hug the hologram
â€‹â€¢ Grand opening news on TV when Dropsy wakes up on opening morning
â€‹â€¢ Circus music plays across scenes on opening day
â€‹â€¢ Add details to costume shop and graveyard to hint at costume shop owner
â€‹â€¢ Polish added to costume shop owner both in costume shop and in graveyard
â€‹â€¢ Both brothers have a copy of the repaired photo after being reunited
â€‹â€¢ Remove dog's barking from mine after you've rescued him
â€‹â€¢ Ejected tape sprite in church now matches the tape correctly
â€‹â€¢ Add hospital signs
â€‹â€¢ Rat bangs around inside tub after Dropsy traps it
â€‹â€¢ Adjust parallax backgrounds in junkyard and desert
â€‹â€¢ Move rocks to foreground in cave passage scene
â€‹â€¢ Minor graphical edits to airport scene
â€‹â€¢ Edit Kickstarter credits for non 16:9 screens
â€‹â€¢ Adjust various object colliders
â€‹â€¢ Correct object tints in various scene
